TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable Cloud extends System.Object implements class System.IEquatable`1<class System.Net.PeerToPeer.Cloud>, class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
Public Class Cloud Implements IEquatable(Of Cloud), ISerializable

summary.span: 指定用来定义对等 对象的值。

span.span: Specifies the values that define a Peer object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A是一组可以通过网络相互进行通信的节点。A is a set of nodes that can communicate with each other through the network. 云、 对等网格和对等关系图是同义词。Cloud, peer mesh, and peer-to-peer graph are synonymous. 单个对等机或节点可以连接到多个云。A single peer or node may be connected to more than one cloud. 节点之间的通信绝不能从一个云跨越至另一个云。Communication between nodes should never cross from one cloud to another. 实例由其名称（区分大小写）唯一标识。A instance is uniquely identified by its name, which is case-sensitive. 云与网络接口紧密相关。Clouds are tied very closely to network interfaces. 在有两个网卡附加到不同子网的一个多宿主计算机上，将返回三个云：每个接口的每个链接本地地址有一个云，还有一个全局范围云。On a multi-homed machine with two network cards attached to different subnets, three clouds will be returned: one for each of the link local addresses per interface, and a single global scope cloud.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法与方法是来获取的新实例的唯一方式类。This method and the methods are the only ways to get new instances of the class. 云与网络接口紧密相关。Clouds are tied very closely to network interfaces. 多宿主计算机上以两个网卡连接到不同子网，将返回三个云： 一个用于的每个链接本地地址，每个接口和一个作用域。On a multi-homed machine with two network cards attached to different subnets, three clouds will be returned: one for each of the link local addresses per interface, and a single scope .

summary.span: 获取对等 的网络范围。

span.span: Gets the network scope of the peer .

span.span: enumeration value that specifies the PNRP scope of the current peer cloud instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 云与网络接口紧密相关。Clouds are tied very closely to network interfaces. 具有两个网卡连接到不同子网的多宿主计算机上, 三个网络范围还可能有： 一个用于的每个链接本地地址，每个接口和一个作用域。On a multi-homed machine with two network cards attached to different subnets, three network scopes are possible: one for each of the link local addresses per interface, and a single scope .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 具有两个网卡连接到不同子网的多宿主计算机上, 两个网络作用域还可能有： 一个是本地的链接，另一个是作用域。On a multi-homed machine with two network cards attached to different subnets, two network scopes are possible: one is a link local , and the other is scope.
